unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Mean Prize
question_text: Recently a fast food store ran a promotion to increase sales. Certain hamburgers came specially wrapped in gold wrappers. A gold wrapped burger wins the customer $\$5$ . If $1.5\%$ of the burgers are wrapped in gold, how many burgers would one expect to buy in order to win the $\$5$ ?
